row.process:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path to the Request (JSON) file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_FILE_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "CreateIssueAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
:SET &CHECK# = 0
:IF &UC4RB_JIRA_FILE_PATH# NE "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JIRA_JSON# NE "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 :ENDIF
:IF &CHECK# <> 1 : STOP MSG , 50, "Either json file path or json must be provided" :ELSE
: SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_JIRA_FILE_PATH#
: IF &UC4RB_JIRA_JSON# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_JSON_FILE_CONTENTS# = &UC4RB_JIRA_JSON#
!-----------creating issue fields file --------------------
: SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,"createissue-&$RUNID#.json")
: SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_JSON_FILE_CONTENTS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE : SET &DELETEFILE# = 1 : PUBLISH &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH#
: ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -jsonFilePath &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" : CASE "UNIX" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" : OTHER : ENDSWITCH : ENDIF
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE ISSUE ADVANCE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE ISSUE ADVANCE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
! Publishing issue id and key :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:SET &FLAG# =0 :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID#,,"TOP" : SET &FLAG# = &FLAG# +1 : ENDIF : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEY" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEY# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEY#,,"TOP" : SET &FLAG# = &FLAG# +1 : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# EQ 2 : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID# = "" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEY# = "" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID#,,"TOP" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_KEY#,,"TOP" :ENDIF
